name: Neon Line Ride
description:
Neon Line Ride is an endless platformer game created for the Amaze Me Game Jam. Avoid countless enemies and ride between the lines as you aim to beat your own high score. Collect power-ups to help you on your journey, and even use them to turn off the lights.

In it's current state, this game is just a demo for a larger project. So please enjoy and stay tuned for any updates.

Thank you very much!

Neon Line Ride was created by OffDragon.

Game Controls:

  • WS or Up and Down keys to jump up or down between the platforms
  • A or Left Key to use a power-up
  • D or Right Key to fire your gun
  • ESC to pause the game
  • L-Shift to switch between fullscreen or window mode

Power-Ups:

  • Blackout: The world turns dark and enemies can't even touch you! Still, watch out for those breaks in the line.
  • Refills: Refill your ammo to keep blasting those who stand in your way.
  • Max Ammo Increase: Keep running out of ammo? Don't worry, here's some more.
  • Shield: While this shield is up, enemies can't hurt you.
  • Max Life Increase: Falling off the line hurts, but this allows you to keep on riding.
